title: Dot in space
creator_credit: Yoram Gross Films and Yoram Gross
brief_description: Dot’s new adventure takes her into outer space. She decides to resue Whyka, a Russian dog who is circling the Earth in a broken satellite. Once Dot saves Whyka, her troubles really begin. Her spacehip, Atlanta, crashes onto a planet called Pie-Arr-Squared. The inhabitants, called Roundies, imprison Dot and Whyka with the “Squaries”, unfortunate beings who are not considered round enough!
